mapper.sql:
FROM codeGroup a inner join code b on b.codeGroup_seq = a.seq WHERE 1=1 AND b.useNy = #{shuseNy}
AND codeGroupCode = #{shValue} AND codeGroupNameKor LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND codeGroupNameEng LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND codeNameKor LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND codeNameEng LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT b.seq ,a.seq as codeGroup_seq ,a.codeGroupCode, a.codeGroupNameKor, a.codeGroupNameEng, b.codeAnother, b.codeNameKor ,b.codeNameEng ,b.useNy ,b.turn
ORDER BY b.seq DESC

SELECT a.codeGroup_seq ,b.codeGroupNameKor ,b.codeGroupCode ,a.seq ,a.codeAnother ,a.codeNameKor ,a.codeNameEng ,a.useNy ,a.turn ,a.content ,a.delNy ,a.varcharType1 ,a.varcharType2 ,a.varcharType3 ,a.intType1 ,a.intType2 ,a.intType3 ,a.registerDateTime ,a.modifyDateTime FROM code a inner join codeGroup b on a.codeGroup_seq = b.seq WHERE 1=1 AND a.seq = #{seq}
SELECT COUNT(codeAnother) FROM code a WHERE 1=1 AND a.codeAnother = #{codeAnother}
mapper.update: UPDATE code SET useNy = 0 ,delNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT codeAnother , codeNameKor , codeGroup_seq FROM code WHERE 1=1 AND delNy = 0 AND useNy = 1
